metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5602 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: sudoedit in Sudo before 1.8.15 allows local users to gain privileges via a symlink attack on a file whose full path is defined using multiple wildcards in /etc/sudoers, as demonstrated by "/home/*/*/file.txt."

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Backporting the fix for this issue is risky, may introduce regressions, and will change behaviour for existing users, possibly preventing them from using their existing configuration.  For this reason, we will not be fixing this issue in stable releases.

criterions.comment: sudo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
